bfc5c9f99180be5eacce9683a6cc1b2ab28d4003.name: GetDocumentsFiltered
bfc5c9f99180be5eacce9683a6cc1b2ab28d4003.source:
query GetDocumentsFiltered($userId: ID!, $limit: Int!, $before: Date, $orderBy: OrderTypes, $orderDirection: OrderDirections) {
  documents(
    userId: $userId
    limit: $limit
    before: $before
    orderBy: $orderBy
    orderDirection: $orderDirection
  ) {
    __typename
    id
    name
    isPublic
    author {
      __typename
      id
      userName
      email
      type
    }
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    unreadCount
  }
}
